snippet: The next season of "Downton Abbey" won't be broadcast until January for American audiences, but fans of the show can visit the filming location now. Highclere Castle, a short train ride from London's city center, has been the setting for the show's...
abstract: The next season of "Downton Abbey" won't be broadcast until January for American audiences, but fans of the show can visit the filming location now. Highclere Castle, a short train ride from London's city center, has been the setting for the show's scandal and intrigue since the first episode, and each summer the castle's owners open the building and grounds to the public.

headline.main: 'Downton Abbey' Castle Is Open to Tours
